code: import i18next from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import ru from"./locales/ru/transalation.json";import uz from"./locales/uz/transalation.json";import LanguageDetector from"i18next-browser-languagedetector";i18next.use(initReactI18next).use(LanguageDetector).init({resources:{uz:{translation:uz},ru:{translation:ru}},lng:window.localStorage.getItem('i18nextLng'),fallbackLng:'ru',detection:{order:['htmlTag','cookie','localStorage','path','subdomain'],caches:['cookie','localStorage']}});export default i18next;
